transcripts.text: As parents, it is important that we understand how to talk to our kids about coronavirus.  First, reassure them that they are safe, which is the most important message your kids can hear from you.  Second, emphasize simple things your family can do to be germ busters for all types of germs that are out there.  And third, answer any questions your kids may have to make sure they have accurate facts.  For more information, go to DetroitPBSKids.org.
